channel.title: RSPS PK points resetting to 0 on Log-in 317 Delta
channel.description: I have posted before with little luck. My pk points reset themselves to 0 but i don't understand the private server coding well enough yet to fix this problem by myself. However, you can see my code as i used a tutorial and this is the tutorial used http://www.runelocus.com/forums/showthread.php?2763-317-Adding-Pk-Points-also-making-a-shop-for-it What happens? Well I kill someone, my points go to 1. I log out my points remain at 1, i log back in, and my points are put back to 0. If you see the problem here within this code please tell me as i need this fixed. -Help Appreciated.

item.title: RSPS PK points resetting to 0 on Log-in 317 Delta
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

Possible the value resets at login so check there,
or it doesn’t get saved to the character files,

Read full topic
item.source: RSPS PK points resetting to 0 on Log-in 317 Delta

I have posted before with little luck. My pk points reset themselves to 0 but i don’t understand the private server coding well enough yet to fix this problem by myself.
However, you can see my code as i used a tutorial and this is the tutorial used
http://www.runelocus.com/forums/showthread.php?2763-317-Adding-Pk-Points-also-making-a-shop-for-it
What happens?
Well I kill someone, my points go to 1. I log out my points remain at 1, i log back in, and my points are put back to 0. If you see the problem here within this code please tell me as i need this fixed.
-Help Appreciated.
